item.description:
Networking is an essential strategy for service professionals and small business owners to market and grow their business. When you hear the word networking, however, you might tense up, or even feel fear. Going across town to be in a room full of strangers can be especially uncomfortable if you’re shy, not sure how to approach strangers or worried about first impressions.

Even though networking is a major part of achieving any career or business goal, introverts and others are apt to avoid it. This can have serious consequences for your business success—and your dreams!

It’s time to change that!

Get Free Teleclass Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-t2

Learn from a former wallflower how to make networking easy and fun. It’s possible!

The featured speaker is Val Nelson, Career & Business Coach from Northampton, MA, who describes herself as an Ex-Wallflower Finally Living My Purpose.

This no cost teleclass will be an abbreviated 45 minute version of a 3 hour in person workshop that Val Nelson leads called Networking Secrets from an Ex-Wallflower™ (See below for more on what you’ll learn during this session.)

Val is a former wallflower who has learned to enjoy networking and the creative flow of self-employment. Thanks to her strong network, her business has a steady flow of clients. She found that following her heart has been the key to rising above fears of visibility. Her passion is to help others find their own clarity and confidence so they can make their mark on the world. She does this primarily through coaching and group courses. Her wallflower recovery story and complete bio can be found at ValNelson.com.

Your host is marketing results coach Mark Reinert, founder of Authentic Business Growth, LLC and the creator of the Business Growth Dojo™ the definitive business incubator for independent professionals and owners of small service-based businesses.

Get Free Teleclass Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-t2

During this program you will learn:

  • What networking is and isn't. (hint: It's NOT what you think.)
  • Why you don't need the perfect words to be good at networking.
  • Five secrets to make networking easier and more effective.
  • Why you shouldn’t just suck it up or put on a mask to be good at networking. (In fact, don't do that; it won't work.)
  • What actually matters for networking. (Knowing this will improve your results.)
  • Be inspired by Val’s story of how she went from being a wallflower to someone who loves networking.
  • The strengths and challenges to networking for both introverts and extroverts
  • How to make networking easy and effective for both introverts and extroverts,
  • How to move forward if you hate networking (and what do about fear).
  • What to say- that works and feels authentic.
  • What a black swan can teach you

Get Free Teleclass Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-t2
item.name: An Ex-Wallflower’s Networking Secrets in a Nutshell
